agents.name: Strategist
agents.role: Plans overall workflow, decides task sequencing, verifies logic, and optimizes bug bounty automation direction.

agents.name: Executor
agents.role: Executes scripts, validates syntax, performs git commits, runs local tests, and handles recon.sh deployments.

agents.name: Composer 1 — Automation Engineer
agents.role: Maintains, updates, and hardens recon.sh, auto_runner.sh, and post_scan scripts.

agents.name: Composer 2 — Parallelization & Optimization
agents.role: Implements concurrent recon runs, optimizes threading logic, and resource allocation for maximum throughput.

agents.name: Composer 3 — Documentation & Reporting
agents.role: Auto-updates README.md, CHANGELOG.md, and summary.md. Generates post-run analytics and visual summaries.

agents.name: Composer 4 — CI/CD & Security Ops
agents.role: Creates GitHub workflows, Docker integration, and environment hardening (YAML + GitHub Actions).
